animation-composition.name: animation-composition
animation-composition.computedValue: list, each item a keyword as specified

animation-timeline.name: animation-timeline
animation-timeline.computedValue: list, each item either a case-sensitive css identifier or the keywords none, auto.

<timeline-name>.prose: Find the last timeline at-rule in document order with its name matching <timeline-name>. If such a timeline at-rule exists, then the animationâ€™s timeline is a timeline as defined by that rule. Otherwise the animation is not associated with a timeline. <timeline-name> = <custom-ident> | <string>
